title: Reds... Please help...
body:
It's getting a bit over the top now, these two boosting accounts are spamming the crap out of me, and they're not even on my friends list.
Lotheinue
Aluveth

Please help.

replies.body: Here is an example, but they're doing it when I'm in game too.

wow pretty obvious they being using that site as well. NO WAY would a real master tier person would be sending that link. Pretty obvious they used/using it. it really makes me feel like {{champion:32}}
You are a bit of a moron for making this thread rather than just deleting them.
they don't appear in your friends list, therefore you cant delete them or take any action against them

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=79iTTEm3,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-01T07:23:19.008+0000)
>
> they don't appear in your friends list, therefore you cant delete them or take any action against them

They cannot msg you if they aren't on your friends list, unless you are in a chat room. And you can quite clearly see that he is on the OP's friends list in the pic.

Well when this happened to me, i got a request to add friend, and clicked accept thinking it was someone from the game i just played, i get a message from them (that i knew was just spam) so i went to my friends list to delete them and they weren't there.
yeah, so you guess the bot deleted you so your like fine. Then 10 min later is msg u again and again and you cant stop it
I had something similar, except they didn't pester me as much but you're right they don't appear in your friends list and its really annoying.

It may have something to do with me asking them to leave me alone.

Guess it was rather foolish of me to think they'd take the civil road.
